sentences.en: He was killed by an onrushing locomotive.
sentences.cn: 他被飞驰而来的火车头撞死了。

sentences.en: The people took flight be fore the onrushing fire.
sentences.cn: 大火卷来,人们纷纷逃窜.

words.tran_cn: 汹涌的；猛冲的；顾前不顾后奔跑的

trans.tran_cn: 顾前不顾后奔跑的，猛冲的，汹涌的
trans.tran_en: Onrushing describes something such as a vehicle that is moving forward so quickly or forcefully that it would be very difficult to stop
